explains: adv. 向后；处于顶风位置；向后地；吓了一跳

sentences.en: She was completely taken aback by his anger.
sentences.cn: 他的愤怒把她吓了一大跳。

sentences.en: Roland was taken aback by our strength of feeling.
sentences.cn: 罗兰对我们感情的强烈程度感到很吃惊。

sentences.en: We were rather taken aback by her hostile reaction.
sentences.cn: 她敌视的反应使我们大吃一惊。
